name: Dumbbell
text: Can be held in hands while walking to boost calorie-burning.

name: Barbell
text: A barbell is a straight metal bar designed to support compound movements.

name: Leg Press Machine
text: The leg press is a powerful compound lower-body exercise .

name: Kettlebell
text: Kettlebells are a great tool for strength training.

name: Foldable Treadmills
text: The treadmill is for indoor use and storage only.

name: Soft Hand Grips
text: An effective way to strengthen your hand, wrist and forearm muscles.
